text: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six is a video game franchise published by Ubisoft that is based on American author Tom Clancy's 1998 novel Rainbow Six. The franchise and its games is about a fictional international counter-terrorist unit called "Rainbow". ==List of games== Overview of released games Title Microsoft Windows release Console versions Mobile versions Comments Rainbow Six 1998 ; DC (2000) Rainbow Six Mission Pack: Eagle Watch 1999 expansion pack Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear 1999 ; PS1 (2001) Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear Mission Pack Urban Operations 2000 expansion pack Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear Covert Ops Essentials 2000 expansion pack (stand-alone) Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear Black Thorn 2001 expansion pack (stand-alone) Rainbow Six: Take-Down â€“ Missions in Korea 2001 Not released outside of South Korea (stand-alone) Rainbow Six: Lone Wolf Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield 2003 ; PS2, GameCube (2004) Rainbow Six 3: Athena Sword 2004 expansion pack Rainbow Six 3: Black Arrow Rainbow Six 3: Iron Wrath 2005 expansion pack (DLC) Rainbow Six: Broken Wings Mobile game (2003) Rainbow Six: Urban Crisis 2004 Rainbow Six: Lockdown 2006 Rainbow Six: Critical Hour Rainbow Six: Vegas 2006 , Mobile game Rainbow Six: Vegas 2 2008 Rainbow Six: Shadow Vanguard Based on the original Rainbow 6: Patriots Cancelled Rainbow Six Siege 2015 ; PS5, Xbox Series X/S (2020); Stadia (2021) Online-only reboot Rainbow Six Extraction 2022 Rainbow Six Mobile ==References== Category:Ubisoft games
title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six
